entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Point Escuminac
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Miramichi 5:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -8.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 48 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -17.4°C
Wind: S 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow at times heavy beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or snow. High 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets changing to rain late in the morning. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 15 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 80 late in the morning. High 8. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries late in the evening and ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
